overview: While doing field work in Australiaâ€™s Gibson Desert, Snowy Grinder meets up with a wierdo named Archie. Together they set off to find the missing Dr. Jim Hartwell and Monomotapa, the Palace of Purple Diamonds. They are searching for the city of Monomotapa and a precious jewel, but they haven't accounted for the Gods.
tagline: A lost treasure city, a world war, and the wildest collection of scoundrels in history!
title: Jewel of the Gods
